definition: classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]
circle/ring/loop/classifier for loops, orbits, laps of race etc/CL:個|个[ge4]/to surround/to circle
to confine/to lock up/to pen in

sentences.english: The analysis on the meridional circulation also proves above view.
sentences.chinese: 經圈環流的分析結果也與此相吻合。

sentences.english: Such local meridional circulation leads to the dry climatology over the two deserts.
sentences.chinese: 正是這種局地經圈環流導致了該兩處乾旱氣候的形成。
